analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Dhamma Paccaya Table, the Triad Table, the Paṭṭhāna Text

analyzed: na kusalam na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca
translated: The Triad on the Wholesome, the Dyads beginning with Associated with Cause🔽With the dyad on the wholesome and the dyad on the unwholesome as the first, and the dyads on the unprofitable and the dyads on the root-causes as the second,🔽the dyads are combined in all possible ways, making 15 triads.

original: Hetuyā pannarasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate pannarasa.
analyzed: hetuyā pannarasa ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate pannarasa
translated: With the dyad on the wholesome and the dyad on the unwholesome as the first, and the dyad on the unprofitable and the dyad on the root-causes as the second,🔽the dyads are combined in all possible ways, making 24 triads.

analyzed: na kusalam na hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With the dyad on the wholesome and the dyad on the unwholesome as the first, and the dyad on the root-causes and the dyad on the root-cause-possessing as the second,

original: Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa
translated: the dyads are combined in all possible ways, making 24 triads.

original: Nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naahetukañceva
analyzed: na kusalam na hetum ca iva na ahetukam ca dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na ahetukam ca iva
translated: With the dyad on the wholesome and the dyad on the unwholesome as the first, and the dyad on the root-cause-possessing and the dyad on the root-cause-possessing-unrelated as the second,🔽the dyads are combined in all possible ways, making 24 triads.

original: nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na hetum ca iva na hetu vippayuttam ca dhamma
translated: With the dyad on the wholesome and the dyad on the unwholesome as the first, and the dyad on the root-cause-possessing-unrelated and the dyad on the root-cause-possessing-related as the second,🔽the dyads are combined in all possible ways, making 24 triads.

original: paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca pe na kusalam na hetu vippayuttam ca iva na na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca
translated: With the dyad on the wholesome and the dyad on the unwholesome as the first, and the dyad on the root-cause-possessing-unrelated and the dyad on the root-cause-possessing-related as the second,

original: Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa
translated: the dyads are combined in all possible ways, making 24 triads.

analyzed: na kusalam na hetum na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na hetum na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa
translated: A profitable, root-free, root-free … (Abbreviated.) In the case of root, twenty-four … In the case of kamma-result, nine … In the case of the undetermined, twenty-four.
